content:
There are many activities you can do together in a long-distance relationship. Here are some ideas:

1. Watch TV shows and movies: You can use video chat and screen sharing to watch your favorite TV shows and movies together. Services like Netflix Party can help you sync your viewing and chat.

2. Play online games: Playing online games can be a fun way to stay connected. There are several multiplayer games that you can play together such as chess, Scrabble, Monopoly, and more.

3. Share music playlists: Share your favorite music playlists and discover new tracks together. This can be a great way to bond and learn about each other's tastes.

4. Order food and eat together: Order food delivery from the same restaurant and video call each other as you eat together.

5. Workout together: Use video chat to workout together. You can pick a workout video on YouTube or create your own workout routine.

6. Plan your future: Make plans for your future vacations or trips together. This can help you stay hopeful and connected despite being apart.

Remember that the key to making these activities work is to communicate and commit to spending time together. With a bit of planning and creativity, you can have a lot of fun together, even if you're physically apart.
